Certainly too late for 4.5 now, but I found the following issue:

There see=
m to be now way to create an error reporting runner using public interfaces=
.  
Request.errorReport() is _depercated_ and refers to the _internal_ clas=
s 
ErrorReportingRunner.

Otherwise, porting JExample from 4.4 to 4.5 was m=
ainly a matter of renaming import 
declarations. Now my custom runner uses =
public interfaces only, well done! 

cheers,
AA
